actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa, Global Health, Global Human Rights and International Organizations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Africa, Global Health, Global Human Rights and International Organizations

official_title: To require that activities carried out by the United States in South Sudan relating to governance, reconstruction and development, and refugee relief and assistance will support the basic human rights of women and women's participation and leadership in these areas.
short_title: Equal Rights and Access for the Women of South Sudan Act

summary.text:
Equal Rights and Access for the Women of South Sudan Act 

Requires that activities carried out by the United States in South Sudan relating to governance, post-conflict reconstruction and development, police and military training, and refugee relief and assistance support the human rights of women and their full political, social, and economic participation.

titles.title: Equal Rights and Access for the Women of South Sudan Act

To require that activities carried out by the United States in South Sudan relating to governance, reconstruction and development, and refugee relief and assistance will support the basic human rights of women and women's participation and leadership in these areas.
